attributes.additional_details:
We are now living in an overcrowded country.  Why is the state still paying for people to have children.  If you can't afford them don't have them.  The country will save billions each year on schools, health and other areas and the population of this country should stabilise not continue to increase rapidly.

It will also stop the workshy using having kids as a career option and being housed at the taxpayers expense in larger properties that hard working taxpayers can't afford.
